laboratory_examinations.findings: WBC 7.1 (76% PMN), H/H 15.1/45, plt 140, Na 139, K 4.3, Cl 104, HCO3 22, BUN 30, Cr 2.3, glucose 121, ALT 42, AST 96, AP 64, LDH 742, lip ___, Tbili 1.3, alb 4.7, Tn <0.01 and lactate 1.4

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Results indicate a decrease in ALT and AST levels from initial values of 42 and 96 respectively, and significantly elevated amylase and lipase levels.

laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in contour and echotexture. There are no concerning focal liver lesions identified. The spleen is top normal in size, measuring 14 cm. A large gallstone is seen within the gallbladder neck, measuring 2.3 cm.
